summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Building Department; continuing a certain temporary position in connection with the enforcement of the Seattle Shoreline Master Program through December 31, 1978, increasing the expenditure allowance for Object of Expenditure "1000 Personal Services" in Program Category "Plans Examination" (3500) in the 1978 Budget of said Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
